name: Kitchen Chaos (itch) (Sabhari Shrinivas)
description:
Play as a duck chef and cook delicious meals for your customers. Keep your customers happy by serving the right and properly cooked food.

I plan to add several other features to this game such as Customer AI, customer ratings, and your restaurant ratings. If you like this game, please comment whether you like it, don't like it, found bugs, or want to see some updates. Thank you very much for playing this game.
